entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Not documented that the List<T>.RemoveAll method can corrupt the list #66255
  • JIT Optimization: Eliminate duplicate `bswap` #66249
  • Is it possible replacing .NET System libraries with custom ones? #66246
  • Extra round trip due to 407 proxy authentication when using proxy with basic auth #66244
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.CompareRequest fails on Linux when invoked with string attribute value #66243
  • JIT: Invalid result on x86 with forward sub #66242
    7.0.0
  • [android][mono] Test failure System.Net.Sockets.Tests #66241
  • [mono] Failing test System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.InvalidTypeTests_Writer.DeserializeInvalidType #66240
  • Epilog unwinding code may fail in certain cases #66238
    7.0.0
  • Method binding by name with Type.DefaultBinder.BindToMethod fails with specific condition #66237
  • System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests failing with `FileLoadException` on net48 runs #66232
    7.0.0
  • Configuration Binding a dictionary with a key that has empty value skips the key as well #66229
  • (Should we) Provide implementations for {RSA,DSA,ECDsa}.HashData(?) #66228
    Future

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Make Type-Argument contra-variant in IEquatable<in T> and IComparable<in T> #66236
  • System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.CustomConverterTests.GetConverter_Poco_WriteThrowsNotSupportedException test failed. #66239
  • System.Linq work planned for .NET 7 #64601
    7.0.0
  • `System.Text.Json.Tests` failing due to `Could not load file or assembly 'System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe'` #66231
  • Interop+Crypto+OpenSSLCryptographicException while connecting to DB2 #31703
    Future
  • Erro MSB3073 while build on Ubuntu 18.04 for armel debian buster #40166
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCmsTests.Tests.KeyTransRecipientInfoTests.TestKeyTransEncryptedKey_RoundTrip #42568
    Future
  • Can OpenSSL native library be lazy loaded? #46076
    Future
  • OpenSSL shared library issue on Ubuntu 20.04 #46946
    Future
  • After adding friendly name to x509certificate2 on exporting public bytes , we are loosing friendly name #49993
    Future
  • Question: How to make ComputeSignature with silent: false show a PIN prompt? #51337
    Future
  • Question: are APIs in System.Security.Cryptography.Cng and System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs available in Mono? #54195
    Future
  • [libraries][OSX] System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests PolicyContraints_Mismatch Failed to generate asymmetric keypair #58640
    Future
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.SignVerify_Array.InvalidKeySize_DoesNotInvalidateKey #62880
  • X.509 Extensions #59191
    Future
  • CAI, OCSP and CDP as System.Uri #59305
    Future
  • Is ALPN support in OpenSSL a required feature? #59431
    Future
  • X509Store.Add pops up a dialog, fails on OneCore system #59638
    Future
  • Question: difference between X509RevocationMode.Offline and X509RevocationMode.Online #64689
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix address exposure in forward sub (x86) #66253
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary return #66252
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Do not generate `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` nodes #66251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • use the name of the header when throwing exception for invalid chars #66250
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Fix issues related to JsonSerializerOptions mutation and caching. #66248
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix a couple issues with `GTF_GLOB_REF` setting #66247
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize movzx after setcc #66245
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove compiler warning suppression #66234
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Rename `$(EmccInitialMemory)` to `$(EmccInitialHeapSize)` #66233
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix race conditions in SystemEvents shutdown logic #66230
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Revert "Fix issues related to JsonSerializerOptions mutation and caching." #66235
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [mono][llvm] Fix crashes when methods fail LLVM compilation. #65391
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Replace TargetFrameworks with TargetFramework where possible #66198
  • Address feedback on fabricbot config for area pods #66137
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Replace CngCommon hash with OneShotHashHelpers #66227
    area-System.Security
  • Rename classes in p/invoke generator to be `LibraryImport` #66217
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Use CMakeProjectReference instead of ProjectReference #66202
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating native traces from JS, using a symbols file #66042
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add HostApplicationBuilder #65109
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting

Updated

  • JIT: add OSR patchpoint strategy, inhibit tail duplication #66208
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [crossgen2] Promote single byref aot. #65682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1647056 #66130
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Draft]Use ValueStringBuilder in Encode/DecodeName #65893
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Move Array.CreateInstance methods to shared CoreLib #66025
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS] Enable some previously skipped tests #65652
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix NonBacktracking quadratic behavior with deep loops #66038
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Port commits from PR-48140 to dotnet 5.0. #66087
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Revert "[Mono] Add SIMD intrinsic for Vector64/128 comparisons (#65128)" #66088
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Backport docs fixes for Cbor #66180
    area-System.Formats.Cbor
  • [mono] Put WeakAttribute support under an ifdef #66213
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Remove SkipVerification support from the runtime #66211
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Revisiting nullable annotations on caching #66215
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Try to remove "-" and "'" from HighCharTable #66200
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • Add partial to the enclosing types when running the ConvertToGeneratedDllImport fixer #65452
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add the CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute type to make it easier to identify marshaller types #65591
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
